Team"]}]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose prose-invert prose-lg max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Google ADK: Production-Ready Multi-Agent Orchestration"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Google's Agent Development Kit (ADK) has matured from beta to production-ready with v1.24.1 (released Feb 6, 2026), featuring bi-weekly releases, multi-language support, and powerful multi-agent orchestration patterns."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"What is Google ADK?"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Google ADK is an open-source, free framework for building AI agents that:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Provides multi-agent orchestration with SequentialAgent, ParallelAgent, LoopAgent, and LLM-driven delegation"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Supports Gemini 3 Pro, Gemini 3 Flash, plus third-party models via LiteLLM"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Offers multi-language SDKs: Python (most mature), TypeScript, Go, Java"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"Integrates natively with Vertex AI Agent Engine Runtime"}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":"Includes Datadog observability integration and built-in OpenTelemetry"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Multi-Agent Orchestration"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"ADK's most powerful feature is its agent orchestration system:"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"SequentialAgent"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Chains agents in order — output of one feeds into the next. Ideal for pipelines like: research -> analyze -> generate report."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"ParallelAgent"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Runs multiple agents simultaneously for independent subtasks. Dramatically reduces latency when tasks do not depend on each other."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"LoopAgent"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Iterates an agent until a condition is met. Useful for refinement cycles: generate -> evaluate -> improve -> repeat."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"LLM-Driven Delegation"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"An orchestrator agent uses an LLM to dynamically decide which sub-agent to invoke based on the task, enabling flexible routing without hardcoded logic."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"New Features (v1.24.x)"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Agent Config (No-Code)"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Define agents via configuration files without writing code. Enables non-developers to create and modify agent behaviors."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Tool Confirmation (Human-in-the-Loop)"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Agents can pause and request human approval before executing sensitive tools, providing a safety net for critical operations."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Session Rewind"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Roll back agent sessions to a previous state, enabling debugging and recovery from errors mid-conversation."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Interactions API"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"New state management system optimized for agentic loops, providing structured access to conversation history, agent state, and tool execution results."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"AgentEngineSandboxCodeExecutor"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Secure code execution environment within Vertex AI Agent Engine for running agent-generated code safely."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Enterprise Integrations"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"BigQuery (Native MCP Toolbox)"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Native integration via the MCP Toolbox for BigQuery enables agents to query, analyze, and act on warehouse data directly."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Cloud SQL"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Direct database connectivity via MCP Toolbox for Databases, supporting PostgreSQL, MySQL, Spanner, AlloyDB, and 15+ databases."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Vertex AI Agent Engine Runtime"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Managed runtime for deploying and scaling agents in production with built-in monitoring."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Datadog Observability"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"First-class integration with Datadog for tracing agent execution, monitoring latency, and alerting on failures."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Production Deployment"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Performance Metrics (Updated)"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Uptime"}],": 99.97%"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Avg Response Time"}],": 285ms"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Multi-agent pipeline latency"}],": 1.2s average for 3-agent chains"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Cost/Request"}],": $0.002 (with Gemini 3 Flash for lightweight tasks)"]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Best Practices"}],"\n",["$","ol",null,{"className":"list-decimal list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Code-first approach"}]," — Define agents in code for version control and testing"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Multi-agent hierarchies"}]," — Decompose complex tasks across specialized agents"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Parallel tool execution"}]," — Use ParallelAgent for independent subtasks"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"State management"}]," — Use the Interactions API for structured state access"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Human-in-the-loop"}]," — Enable Tool Confirmation for sensitive operations"]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Conclusion"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Google ADK has evolved from a beta GCP-only tool into a production-ready, open-source, multi-language framework. The multi-agent orchestration patterns, combined with Gemini 3 support and enterprise integrations, make it a strong choice for teams building complex agent systems."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Recommended for"}],":"]}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc deployments"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Teams wanting multi-language SDK support (Python, TypeScript, Go, Java)"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"Enterprise observability
